text: Z for Zachariah is a 2015 Icelandic New Zealand Swiss science fiction movie directed by Craig Zobel and based on the novel of the same name by Robert C. O'Brien. It stars Chris Pine, Margot Robbie, Chiwetel Ejiofor and was distributed by Lionsgate Films. ==Other websites== * Category:2015 science fiction movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:New Zealand science fiction movies Category:Swiss movies Category:Movies directed by Craig Zobel Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies
title: Z for Zachariah
